name: OneHandShooter
description:
One Hand Shooter is a 3d shooter game, that only plays with W-S-D-A buttons.

It's an unfinished game to try the concept.

play the game and try to defeat the only enemy.

  • [w] : move forward + shoot
  • [S] : move backward + shield
  • [D] :  move right
  • [A] : move left
